Alhassane Dante Issoufou (a mụrụ Jenụwarị 1, 1981) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger na-egwu egwu dịka onye ọkpọ.
Tupu ịbanye na klọb Morrocain gbara ASO Chlef wee gosipụta ya Zumunta AC, Africa Sports, CA Bordj Bou Arreridj, JS du Ténéré, KSC Lokeren na RC Kadiogo
Issoufou bụ onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger. Ọ gbara na 2012 Africa Cup of Nations
Ebe ọ bụ na enweghị ọnụ ọgụgụ ziri ezi emere, okpu Issoufou na ọnụọgụ goolu maka ndị otu mba ka bụ ihe omimi, mana ọ dị ka ọ gbara ihe karịrị egwuregwu 30 wee nye opekata mpe 3 goolu atọ
O meriri CAF Confederation Cup otu ugboro na FUS de Rabat na 2010.
